mapper.sql: t_mark_seekcar_record.id as markSeekcarRecordId, t_mark_seekcar_record.user_id as markSeekcarRecordUserId, t_mark_seekcar_record.mark_seekcar_id as markSeekcarRecordMarkSeekcarId, t_mark_seekcar_record.version as markSeekcarRecordVersion, t_mark_seekcar_record.create_time as markSeekcarRecordCreateTime, t_mark_seekcar_record.update_time as markSeekcarRecordUpdateTime, t_mark_seekcar_record.is_active as markSeekcarRecordIsActive, t_user_detail.nickname as userDetailNickname, t_user_detail.headicon as userDetailHeadicon, t_user_detail.gender as userDetailGender
mapper.select:
select
from t_mark_seekcar_record, t_user_detail where t_mark_seekcar_record.id = #{id} and t_mark_seekcar_record.user_id = t_user_detail.id

select
from t_mark_seekcar_record, t_user_detail where t_mark_seekcar_record.user_id = t_user_detail.id order by t_mark_seekcar_record.update_time desc, t_mark_seekcar_record.create_time desc

select
from t_mark_seekcar_record, t_user_detail
order by
${query.sortColumn} ${query.sortOrder}
t_mark_seekcar_record.update_time desc, t_mark_seekcar_record.create_time desc
